all.name: Message Events
all.description: Logs all activities related to messages within the server, including edits, deletions, and bulk deletions. This provides a comprehensive record of message changes and removals for transparency and tracking.

edits.name: Message Edits
edits.description: Tracks every instance of a message being edited in the server. This includes capturing the original message, the edits made, and the user who performed the edit, ensuring a history of all message alterations.

deletes.name: Message Deletes
deletes.description: Logs when any message is deleted from the server. This event captures the identity of the user who deleted the message and provides transparency into message removal activities.

bulks.name: Message Bulk Deletes
bulks.description: Tracks bulk deletions of messages, where multiple messages are removed at once. This event records the user who initiated the bulk delete and the number of messages affected, providing a detailed log for mass message deletions.

all.name: Member Role Events
all.description: Logs all changes made to member roles within the server. This includes additions, removals, and updates to roles that affect server permissions and member access.

adds.name: Member Role Adds
adds.description: Tracks the addition of roles to members in the server. This helps to monitor the assignment of roles that may grant or remove certain permissions for members.

removes.name: Member Role Removes
removes.description: Logs the removal of roles from members. This includes tracking when roles are taken away, helping to ensure role-based permissions are properly managed and documented.

all.name: Member Name Change Events
all.description: Tracks all changes to a member’s display name within the server. This helps to monitor any modifications made to a user’s identity or nickname.

users.name: Member User Name Changes
users.description: Logs any changes to a member’s global username. This provides a detailed history of when a user alters their global account name on Discord.

globals.name: Member Global Name Changes
globals.description: Tracks global name changes for members on Discord, capturing when they modify their username that affects all servers they are part of.

nicks.name: Member Nick Name Changes
nicks.description: Records changes to a member’s nickname within a specific server. This event helps track personal identifier modifications that are unique to individual servers.

all.name: Member Avatar Change Events
all.description: Logs all changes to a member’s avatar, providing a complete history of when and how members modify their profile picture across all servers.

globals.name: Member Global Avatar Changes
globals.description: Tracks when a member changes their global avatar on Discord, affecting their appearance across all servers they are part of.

servers.name: Member Server Avatar Changes
servers.description: Monitors changes to a member’s avatar that are specific to a particular server. This helps keep track of personalized avatars within individual communities.

all.name: Member Ban and Unban Events
all.description: Logs both ban and unban events for members in the server. This includes tracking when a member is banned or reinstated, ensuring proper moderation and accountability.

adds.name: Member Bans
adds.description: Captures when a member is banned from the server, including the reason for the ban and who performed the action. This helps monitor all bans for security and compliance purposes.

removes.name: Member Unbans
removes.description: Tracks when a member is unbanned, providing insights into any reinstatements and helping to maintain a log of who was unbanned and by whom.

all.name: Member Timeout Events
all.description: Logs all timeout events where a member is temporarily restricted from interacting within the server. This helps to track any disciplinary actions taken within the community.

adds.name: Member Timeouts
adds.description: Records when a member is given a timeout, detailing the user who initiated the action and the duration of the timeout.

removes.name: Member Timeout Removes
removes.description: Tracks the removal of a timeout from a member. This event helps to document when and why a member’s timeout is lifted.

all.name: Server Channel Events
all.description: Logs all channel-related changes in the server, including creation, updates, and deletions. This provides a complete overview of channel management activities.

creates.name: Server Channel Creates
creates.description: Records when a new channel is created within the server, capturing details about the channel type and the user who created it.

updates.name: Server Channel Updates
updates.description: Tracks when a channel’s settings or configuration are updated, providing a log of changes such as permission updates or category reassignments.

deletes.name: Server Channel Deletes
deletes.description: Logs when a channel is deleted from the server, including who initiated the removal and which channel was deleted.

all.name: Server Role Events
all.description: Tracks all events related to server roles, including creation, updates, and deletions. This helps maintain a history of role changes and management in the server.

creates.name: Server Role Creates
creates.description: Logs the creation of new roles within the server, including details about the role name, permissions, and the user who created it.

updates.name: Server Role Updates
updates.description: Captures any updates made to existing server roles, such as changes to permissions or role assignments.

deletes.name: Server Role Deletes
deletes.description: Records when roles are deleted from the server, including the details of which role was removed and who performed the deletion.

all.name: Server Update Events
all.description: Logs all server-wide updates, including changes to settings, server configurations, or major updates that affect the entire server.

all.name: Server Emoji Events
all.description: Tracks all emoji management activities in the server, including creation, updates, and deletions. This helps maintain a log of emoji usage and modifications.

creates.name: Server Emoji Creates
creates.description: Logs when new emojis are created in the server, providing information about the emoji name and who created it.

updates.name: Server Emoji Updates
updates.description: Records when an existing emoji is updated, such as changes to the emoji’s image or name.

deletes.name: Server Emoji Deletes
deletes.description: Tracks when emojis are deleted from the server, noting which emoji was removed and who performed the deletion.

all.name: Server Sticker Events
all.description: Logs all sticker management activities within the server, including creation, updates, and deletions. This is helpful for tracking custom stickers used in the server.

creates.name: Server Sticker Creates
creates.description: Tracks the creation of new stickers in the server, including the sticker’s name and the user who created it.

updates.name: Server Sticker Updates
updates.description: Records updates made to existing stickers, such as changes to their name or image.

deletes.name: Server Sticker Deletes
deletes.description: Captures when a sticker is deleted from the server, including the identity of the user who removed it.

all.name: Voice Channel Events
all.description: Logs all activities related to voice channels in the server, including member joins, moves, and leaves. This helps monitor voice channel participation.

joins.name: Voice Channel Joins
joins.description: Tracks when members join voice channels, providing a record of who is participating in voice chats.

moves.name: Voice Channel Moves
moves.description: Logs when members are moved between different voice channels, capturing the action and the user performing the move.

leaves.name: Voice Channel Leaves
leaves.description: Records when members leave voice channels, helping to monitor the activity and participation within voice chats.

all.name: Member Join-Leave Events
all.description: Tracks when members join or leave the server, including both initial joins and exits. This provides insights into server activity and membership changes.

joins.name: Member Joins
joins.description: Logs when a member joins the server, capturing the member's identity and the time of the join.

leaves.name: Member Leaves
leaves.description: Records when a member leaves the server, whether voluntarily or by other means, and provides a history of exits.

all.name: Warn Events
all.description: Logs all warning events issued to members, including the reasons for warnings and who issued them. This helps maintain a history of disciplinary actions.

adds.name: Warn Adds
adds.description: Tracks when a warning is issued to a member, including the specific reason and the user who gave the warning.

removes.name: Warn Removes
removes.description: Logs when a warning is removed from a member’s record, helping to keep track of the removal of warnings for accountability.

clears.name: Warn Clears
clears.description: Records when all warnings for a member are cleared, helping to manage a member's warning history.

mutes.name: Mute Events
mutes.description: Tracks all mutes applied to members, including the reason for the mute and the duration of the mute, ensuring that disciplinary actions are properly documented.

unmutes.name: Unmute Events
unmutes.description: Logs when a member is unmuted, capturing the action and ensuring transparency in the removal of mutes.

all.name: All Timeout Events
all.description: Logs all timeout events applied to members, including the duration and reason for the timeout. This provides a detailed record of time-based restrictions.

adds.name: Timeout Events
adds.description: Tracks when a member is given a timeout, capturing the start time and duration of the timeout.

removes.name: Timeout Remove Events
removes.description: Records when a timeout is removed from a member, detailing the user who lifted the timeout and when it was removed.

kicks.name: Kick Events
kicks.description: Logs when a member is kicked from the server, including the reason for the kick and the user who performed the action.

all.name: All Ban Events
all.description: Tracks all ban events, including permanent, soft, and temporary bans, providing detailed logs for ban actions taken against members.

regulars.name: Regular Ban Events
regulars.description: Logs all permanent bans within the server, detailing the reason for the ban and the user who issued it.

softs.name: Soft Ban Events
softs.description: Records soft bans, where members are temporarily banned and then automatically unbanned, providing transparency for temporary bans.

temps.name: Temp Ban Events
temps.description: Tracks temporary bans within the server, including the reason, duration, and user who issued the temporary ban.

unbans.name: Unban Events
unbans.description: Logs when a member is unbanned from the server, including the reason for the unban and who performed the action.
